/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network that connects the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
